name: liquivid Video to HTML5
detailed_description:
Liquivid Video to HTML5 is an easy-to-use app that converts a video to HTML5-ready formats (MP4 H.264, Theora OGG, WebM) and also exports the necessary HTML code to embed the video into your web page.

In addition, you can:
* Adjust exposure, levels, saturation, shadow & highlight coloring and brightness
* Trim videos
* Crop and rotate
* Add text

Imports all common video formats and codecs in any resolution (including HD, 2K, 4K), exports MP4 H.264, Theora OGG and WebM (VP8), GIF, WebP

short_description: Liquivid Video to HTML5 is an easy-to-use app that converts a video to HTML5-ready formats (MP4 H.264, Theora OGG, WebM) and also exports the necessary HTML code to embed the video into your web page.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x64 (x86 / 32bit NOT supported!)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any / no special requirements
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
